modShortDescription: Do you hate manually punching all the grass around your base? Well then the ride on lawn mower is a perfect vehicle for you. Cut all the grass around your base with ease!
modDescription:
This mod adds a ride on lawn mower that can cut grass.

Do you hate manually punching all the grass around your base? Well then the ride on lawn mower is a perfect [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) for you. Cut all the grass around your base with ease!

The lawn mower blades can be turned on by pressing F, and it will cut any grass you drive over. It can be unlocked by grease monkey level 4 or by schematics.

## Features

* Grass cutting functionality
* Can be dyed

Special thanks to ocbMaurice for the grass cutting code. Tested and working for A20.5

**IMPORTANT NOTE:** This mod needs to be installed on both client and server for multiplayer. This is a C# mod so **EAC must be OFF**.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Zilox/A20Modlets/-/archive/main/A20Modlets-main.zip?path=Lawn%20Mower)**

If you appreciate Ziloxâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/zilox135).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/29115-lawn-mower/).

**Credits:** [Zilox](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/zilox/), ocbMaurice
